content: Sorry if this is not the right place for user questions -- first time using cranelift and I'm confused about how to get return value of calls using https://docs.rs/cranelift-codegen/0.63.0/cranelift_codegen/ir/trait.InstBuilder.html#method.call. Any tips? I checked "simplejit" (which as far as I can see the only example in the repo?) but it doesn't use that method as far as I can see.
Ahh, actually, simplejit uses that method. Sorry for the noise, I'll read it more carefully.
